de.intranda.digiverso.presentation.managedbeans

Class ConfigurationBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.intranda.digiverso.presentation.managedbeans.ConfigurationBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Named
 @ApplicationScoped
public class ConfigurationBean
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This is a wrapper class for the Configuration class for access from HTML.
    See Also:

      • getRelativeImageFooterHeight

        public java.lang.Double getRelativeImageFooterHeight()
        Access the height of the image Footer for OpenLayers. With apache commons it is not possible to read the xml root element, therefore this method uses jdom.
        Returns:
        the Height of the Footer

      • getImageFooterHeight

        public java.lang.Integer getImageFooterHeight()
        Access the height of the image Footer for OpenLayers. With apache commons it is not possible to read the xml root element, therefore this method uses jdom.
        Returns:
        the Height of the Footer
